name: Technical issue - no 'This is a' diagnosis
description: Real failure: Agent started with 'This is a module system issue'

trigger.subject: pro-essentials-workshop - Issue with lesson 011
trigger.body:
Hey,

I'm getting an error in lesson 011. When I run the code in the browser, I see:

Uncaught SyntaxError: Unexpected token 'export'

What am I doing wrong?
